subTitle: Full Stack Developer
about: Fascinated by the JavaScript ecosystem, I work developing software at <company>ZRP</company>, currently with the following technologies: Javascript, Typescript, VueJS, React, Node, and NestJS.

zrp.description: Development of solutions using NodeJS, Serverless, AWS Lambda, VueJS, React, Ruby on Rails.

twoweb.description: Development of e-commerce layouts, integrations via API's, development of websites and mobile applications. I used the following technologies: Ruby On Rails, Sass, React, Redux, React Native, NodeJS, AdonisJS and Docker.

online.description: Support of ERP systems and development of the cloud system. I used the following technologies: HTML, CSS, Javascript, SQL and PHP.
